price: አረንጓዴዎች የኾኑ የቀጭን ሐር ልብሶችና ወፍራም ሐርም በላያቸው ላይ አልለ፡፡ ከብር የኾኑ አንባሮችንም ይሸለማሉ፡፡ ጌታቸውም አጥሪ የኾነን መጠጥ ያጠጣቸዋል፡፡
arabic: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ʿāliyahum thiyābu sundusin khuḍ'run wa-is'tabraqun waḥullū asāwira min fiḍḍatin wasaqāhum rabbuhum sharāban ṭahūran
translations: and will give them to drink
